FuncDef: This command changes the maximum rate allowed for a weighted scheduling group on the local HSMDA scheduler. Scheduling classes within the group are managed with an aggregate rate limit when either an explicit group rate is defined on the HSMDA scheduling policy or a local override is defined based on the group override command.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the two weighted scheduling groups to be overridden. Values-1, 2.

The megabits-per-second parameter specifies a local limit on the total bandwidth for the weighted scheduling group and overrides any rate defined in the HSMDA scheduler policy for the weighted scheduling group. The parameter is specified in Megabits per second in a base 10 context. A value of 1 equals a rate of 1000000 bits per second. Values-1 to 10000, max (Mb/s).
